content: no scratch baby mitts materials yarn size ~30g of julie asselin leizu fingering fingering newborn weight 90% sw merino / 10% silk 385m / 420yds per 115g ball or any fingering weight equivalent finished measurement 5 circumference x 3 5 height needles 3mm - dpn or 32 for magic loop gauge notions 1 stitch marker tapestry needle 30 sts = 4 in stockinette unblocked no scratch baby mitts 1 of 2 © handknit yarn studio 2020 pattern cuff using the long-tail method cast on 32 sts join in the round being careful not to twist stitches round 1 knit 1 purl 1 to end of round repeat round 1 until your work measures about 1 5 / 4cm 13 rounds hand round 1 k2 kfb* repeat to end of round continue in pattern until entire work measures 3 25 / 8cm from cast on edge 17 rounds decrease round 1 k2 k2tog* repeat to end of round round 2 knit round 3 k1 k2tog* repeat to end of round round 4 knit round 5 k2tog* repeat to end of round repeat rounds 4 and 5 once more break yarn thread through stitches and cinch closed optional icord using a single dpn pick up 3 stitches along the cast on edge slide stitches to opposite end of dpn to knit repeat until icord measures 13 / 33cm or to desired length cut yarn using a darning needle draw the tail through 3 live stitches sew icord to the opposite mittens cast on round finishing weave in ends block if desired no scratch baby mitts 2 of 2 © handknit yarn studio 2020
